criteria.name: decisions_recorded
criteria.description: At least 1 decision recorded from the source report with a valid decision ID

criteria.name: falsifiable_predictions
criteria.description: Each decision has a predicted_outcome that is specific and falsifiable, not vague

criteria.name: tracking_criteria_present
criteria.description: Each decision has at least 1 tracking criterion with measurable condition and date

criteria.name: source_linked
criteria.description: Each decision references the source_report it was extracted from

criteria.name: no_placeholders
criteria.description: No TODO, TBD, PLACEHOLDER, or template brackets in output
